name: Shotgun, Dungeons, Laser Traps
description:
You need to reach the exit from the dungeon.

They will try to stop you: walls, patrol droids, turrets, deadly lasers and mechanisms (rotating and moving).

They will help you: a shotgun (if you find it), agility and ingenuity. Some objects on the way you can move or destroy. You can use the enemy's forces against them: detonate bombs on the way, rotate combat lasers, tricky use "friendly fire". Burning your way to victory!

Many game levels of varying size and difficulty provide a variety of experiences and challenges: somewhere for survival you need dexterity, running and shooting, and somewhere patience and logic.

Classic first-person view. Controls: WASD + mouse.
